title: Poster, "Everglades National Park", ca. 1970
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted in black at bottom of sheet in block letters:EVERGLADES NATIONAL PARK, FLORIDA / NATIONAL PARK SERVICE, U.S. DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIOR
Imprinted in black lower right corner: For sale by the Superintendent of Documents, U.S. Government Printing Office, Wash- / ington, D.C. 20302 - Prine $1.55/Stock number 2405 0487 [star] GPO 470-509
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Densly composed reproduction of a pen and watercolor drawings of the everglades showing a close up of tall grasses by water. Many different animals are depictd in the grasses including crocodiles, bobcats, herons, racoons as well as a myriad number of bugs, butterflies and birds and grasshoppers. Across bottom of sheet in black letters: EVERGLADES NATIONAL PARK, FLORIDA.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Everglades National Park", ca. 1970.
ca. 1970. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-243.
